main.title: Mastercraft Bamboo Monitor Riser
description: A beautiful & handcrafted monitor stand to reduce neck and eye strain.
main.note: Thanks for your support! Your pledge brings us one step closer to sharing Mastercraft Bamboo Monitor Riser worldwide. You will get an email once our campaign is completed. Got it!

about.title: About this project
description: The Mastercraft Bamboo Monitor Riser is a sturdy and stylish platform that elevates your screen to a more comfortable viewing height. Placing your monitor at eye level has the potential to improve your posture and make you more comfortable while at work, helping you stay focused on the task at hand.
Featuring artisan craftsmanship, the simplicity of design creates extra desk space below your computer to allow notepads, pens, and USB sticks to be stored under the stand.
